Name: Landmarks, Constellation CB3, Brooklyn (C 250313 HAK).
Title: Application number C 250313 HAK (Constellation CB3) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 908-910 Madison Street (Block 1483, lots 35 and 36) and 1901-1903A Atlantic Avenue (Block 1556, Lots 33, 34, and 35), Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 3, Council District 41.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
